duties_responsibilities.duty: Recruit and engage AIC course participants from dental offices.
Build relationships with AIC customers and clients to grow Hiossen’s client base.
Provide doctors with a clinical learning experience.
Develop strategies for how Hiossen Implant courses can help potential clients' business needs.
Work closely with Territory Representatives and Branch Managers throughout the closing process.
Complete doctor recruitment tasks and build quality relationships with new clients.
Collaborate with colleagues to meet business needs and assist potential clients with the AIC registration process.
Travel within the assigned territory and visit dental offices daily.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or general education degree (GED); or one to two years related experience and/or training; or equivalent combination of education and experience.
